dependencies.description: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code
dependencies.name: py-cffi

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.
dependencies.name: py-pytest

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
Simple generic functions (similar to Python's own len(), pickle.dump(),
etc.)
dependencies.name: py-simplegeneric

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
R is 'GNU S', a freely available language and environment for
statistical computing and graphics which provides a wide variety of
statistical and graphical techniques: linear and nonlinear modelling,
statistical tests, time series analysis, classification, clustering,
etc. Please consult the R project homepage for further information.
dependencies.name: r

description:
rpy2 is a redesign and rewrite of rpy. It is providing a low-level
interface to R from Python, a proposed high-level interface, including
wrappers to graphical libraries, as well as R-like structures and
functions.
name: py-rpy2

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
